TopicTitle: This game is ruining my life!

Articles.Content:
KSP is WAY TOO MUCH FUN.

Guys, you have to turn it down an notch.

I don't sleep, I woke up at 3:00 AM yesterday and played. I've run out of memory, so now I'm hiding money from my wife so I can buy a more powerful system. My wife thinks I've forgotten about her. I've been designing standardized system as carriers and payloads. I'm planning my expandable space station and dreaming of setting up orbital spaceports around Mun and the other bodies. I have started spelling my name with a K.

And Squad is blame.

Squad! How can you do this to us?

I totally agree. I work long hours, but come home and launch missions at the end of the day.

Firsy thing I do when I get in is fire up the pc and load ksp, wash dishes and then launch to the skies. Its the ideas for crafts and missions that I get all the time.

Can

Not

Stop

Enjoy it, its ace.

With a family, you really need to make sure you maintain a good balance of play time and family time. For me personally, most of my time playing comes when she is sleeping, or out running around doing things. Keep in mind, that while KSP will always be there, your family may not be.
